org.tantalum.storage

Class FlashCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.storage.FlashCache
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidCache, RMSCache

    public abstract class FlashCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A Hashtable-style interface for persistent data. Each implementation is platform-specific (JME, Android, ...)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      char priority
      A unique local identifier for the cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlashCache(char priority)
      The priority must be unique in the application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void clear()
      Remove all items from this flash cache
      abstract byte[] getData(java.lang.String key)
      Get the data object associated with the key from persistent memory
      abstract java.util.Vector getKeys()
      Provide a list of all keys for objects stored in persistent memory
      abstract void putData(java.lang.String key, byte[] bytes)
      Store the data object to persistent memory
      abstract void removeData(java.lang.String key)
      Remove the data object from persistent memory

    • Field Detail

      • priority

        public final char priority
        A unique local identifier for the cache.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlashCache

        public FlashCache(char priority)
        The priority must be unique in the application. Caches with lower priority are garbage collected to save space before caches with higher priority.
        Parameters:
        priority -
